problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not comply with the minimum number of PNCs (four visits)

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women comply with the minimum number of  prenatal cosultations (PNCs) (four visits)
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes respectent le nombre minimum de consultation pré-natale (CPN) (quatre visites).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wana heshimu idadi ya ziara za mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) (ziara 4)

action: Compliance with the minimum number of PNCs (four visits)

message.English: Pregnant women; visit prenatal consultations (PNC) at least four times as recommended to benefit from preventive and curative care, advice that can help ensure your health and that of your unborn child
message.French: Femmes enceintes; consultez au moins quatre fois les services de consultation pré-natale (CPN) tel que recommandé pour bénéficier des soins préventifs et curatifs, des conseils pouvant contribuer à garantir votre santé et celle de votre futur bébé.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa; ni lazima kuenda kwenye Mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) mara 4 kufaidika na matunzo ya kukinga, mashauri ambayo inaweza wasaidia kuhakikisha afya yenu na ya watoto wenu.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not utilize preventive measures against malaria (IPT/SP and sleeping under the LLIN)

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women use preventive measures against malaria (IPT/SP and sleep under the Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN))
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes appliquent les mesures de préventions contre le paludisme (TPI/SP et dormir sous la MILD)
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wanaheshimu hatua za kuzuia malaria (TPI/SP na kulala ndani ya vyandarua vilivyowekwa dawa MILD)

action: Implementation of malaria prevention measures (IPT/SP and sleeping under the LLIN)

message.English: Pregnant women, sleep every night under the Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN) to avoid malaria which is harmful to your health and that of your baby
message.French: Femmes enceintes, dormez toutes les nuits sous la Moustiquaire Imprégnée d’Insecticide à Longue Durée d’Action (MILD) pour éviter la malaria nuisible pour votre santé et celle de votre bébé.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, laleni kila usiku ndani ya Chandarua chenye Dawa ya Kudumu Muda Mrefu (MILD) kuepuka malaria ambayo ni hatari kwa afya yenu na ya watoto wenu.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not have a birth plan

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women develop a birth plan
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes élaborent le plan d'accouchement
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wanafanya  mpango wa ku zaa

action: Development of a birth plan

message.English: Pregnant women, discuss your birth plan with your healthcare providers during prenatal consultation (PNC) so that you can receive quality care during your delivery to safeguard your health, your life and the life of your unborn child.
message.French: Femmes enceintes discutez du plan d’accouchement avec les prestataires lors de la consultation pré-natale (CPN) afin de recevoir des soins de qualité lors de l’accouchement pour préserver votre santé et garantir votre survie ainsi que celle de votre futur bébé.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, ongeleyeni mpango wa uzazi na watoa huduma (waganga) katika Mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) ili mupate huduma bora wakati wa kuzaa, kulinda na kuhakikisha maisha yenu na afya ya watoto wenu.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not seek help from the HC in time when faced with danger signs

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women are aware of the danger signs of pregnancy and seek help from a healthcare facility in time.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes connaissent les signes de danger pour la grossesse et consultent à temps les Centres de Santé
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wanajua dalili za hatari za ujauzito na wanaelekea kwenye kituo cha afya kwa wakati

action: Consultation on the occurrence of a danger sign

message.English: Pregnant women, set up your birth plan according to the healthcare providers' guidelines to guarantee your health and that of your unborn child.
message.French: Femmes enceintes, mettez en place votre plan d'accouchement suivant les orientations des prestataires pour garantir votre santé et celle de votre futur bébé.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, anzisheni  mpango wa uzazi kulingana na miongozo ya watoa huduma (waganga) ili kuhakikisha afya yenu na ya watoto wenu.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women delay going to the health center in case of danger signs or childbirth

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women decide in time to seek help from the health center in case of danger signs or childbirth
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes décident à temps de recourir au centre de santé en cas de signe de danger ou d’accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wana amua kwa wakati kwenda kituo cha afya ikiwa kuna dalili za hatari au kuzaa

action: Non-use of indigenous products to speed up labor and delivery; Follow-up of…

message.English: Pregnant woman, when you notice any of the following signs: bleeding, pain in the lower abdomen, loss of water, high fever, go immediately to the health center to receive appropriate care.
message.French: Femmes enceintes, lorsque vous constatez l’un des signes suivants: saignement, douleurs au bas ventre, perte des eaux, forte fièvre, rendez-vous immédiatement au centre de santé pour recevoir des soins appropriés.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wa pendwa, munapo ona dalili zozote zifuatazo: kutokwa na damu, maumivu chini ya tumbo, kupoteza maji, homa kali, nendeni mara moja kwenye kituo cha afya ili mupate huduma bora.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women use certain indigenous products to speed up labor and delivery

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women do not use indigenous products to speed up labor and delivery
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes n'utilisent pas les produits indigènes pour accélérer le travail et l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito hawatumii dawa za asili kuharakisha kazi na kuzaa

action: Informing the woman of the danger signs during…

message.English: Pregnant women, go give birth in a health facility to benefit from assisted childbirth and ensure quality care for yourself and your baby.
message.French: Femmes enceintes, allez accoucher dans la formation sanitaire pour bénéficier de l’accouchement assisté et vous assurer de recevoir des soins de qualité et de ceux de votre bébé.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, nendeni kuzaa katika kituo cha afya ili nyinyi na wa toto wenu ili mupate huduma bora

problem_behavior: The husband/spouse is not interested in the pregnant woman's health and ignores danger signs

promoted_behavior.English: The husband/spouse is interested in the pregnant woman's health and knows the danger signs
promoted_behavior.French: Le mari/conjoint s'intéresse à la santé de la femme enceinte et connait les signes de danger
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mume/mpenzi anajali afya ya mwanamke mjamzito na anajua dalili za hatari

action: The husband/spouse is involved in the pregnant woman's health and knows the danger signs

message.English: Husband/spouse, go with your pregnant wives to the nearest health center, in order to ensure the harmony of the couple, the blossoming of the woman and a healthy development of the pregnancy
message.French: Mari/conjoint, accompagnez vos femmes enceintes au centre de santé le plus proche, en vue d’assurer l’harmonie du couple, l’épanouissement de la femme et une bonne évolution de la grossesse.
message.Swahili: Mume mpendwa/mpenzi, ongozana na mke wako mjamzito kwenye kituo cha afya cha karibu, ili kuhakikisha maelewano ya wanandoa, maendeleo ya mwanamke na maendeleo mazuri ya ujauzito.

problem_behavior: The husband/spouse does not go with the pregnant woman to PNC.

promoted_behavior.English: The husband/spouse goes with the pregnant woman to prenatal consultations (PNC)
promoted_behavior.French: Le mari/conjoint accompagne la femme enceinte à la consultation pré-natale (CPN)
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mume/mpenzi anaenda na mwanamke mjamzito kwa mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN)

action: Escorting the pregnant woman to the PNC

message.English: Fathers, husbands/spouses, listen carefully: the prenatal consultation allows the pregnant woman to benefit from preventive and curative care, advice on her lifestyle and guarantees her health and that of her unborn child. Thanks to the 4 recommended PNC visits, detection of complications, screening and treatment of infections and other diseases that may occur during pregnancy as well as prevention of transmission of mother-child diseases to ensure good health, harmony of the couple, blossoming of the woman and a good progress of the pregnancy. In order to reduce the dangers associated with pregnancy and childbirth, pregnant women should follow the following six preventive actions: 1. Tetanus vaccination; 2. HIV testing to protect the baby; 3. Take the indicated dose of iron and folic acid to avoid anemia; 4. Enriching meals, especially during the first 3 months of pregnancy; 5. Use iodized salt to prevent spontaneous abortion or premature delivery; 6. Sleep under an impregnated net and take the indicated dose of medication to prevent malaria.
message.French: Pères, mari/conjoint, écoutez bien: la consultation prénatale permet à la femme enceinte de bénéficier des soins préventifs et curatifs, des conseils sur son le mode de vie et garantit sa santé et celle de son futur bébé. Grâce aux 4 visites de consultation pré-natale (CPN) recommandées, la détection des complications, le dépistage et le traitement des infections et autres maladies qui peuvent survenir au cours de la grossesse ainsi que la prévention de la transmission de maladies mère-enfant pour assurer la bonne santé, l’harmonie du couple, l’épanouissement de la femme et une bonne évolution de la grossesse. Afin de réduire les dangers liés à la grossesse et à l’accouchement, les femmes enceintes doivent suivre les six actions préventives suivantes: 1. La vaccination contre le tétanos; 2. Le dépistage du VIH pour protéger le bébé; 3. Prendre la dose indiquée de fer et acide folique pour éviter l'anémie; 4. Enrichir les repas, surtout pendant les 3 premiers mois de grossesse; 5. Consommer du sel iodé pour éviter un avortement spontané ou un accouchement prématuré; 6. Dormir sous une moustiquaire imprégnée et prendre la dose indiquée de médicaments pour éviter le paludisme.
message.Swahili: Akina baba, waume/wenzi, mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa yanamruhusu mwanamke mjamzito kufaidika na utunzaji wa kuzuia ma shida. Ushauri juu ya maisha yake na kuhakikisha afya yake na ya mtoto wake ambaye hajazaliwa. Kupitia ziara 4 zilizopendekezwa za Mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN), kugundua matatizo, uchunguzi na matibabu ya maambukizi na magonjwa mengine ambayo yanaweza kutokea wakati wa ujauzito pamoja na kuzuia maambukizi ya magonjwa ya mama na mtoto ili kuhakikisha afya njema, maelewano ya wanandoa, utimilifu wa mwanamke na maendeleo mazuri ya ujauzito. Ili kupunguza hatari zinazohusiana na ujauzito na kuzaa, wanawake wajawazito wanapaswa kufuata hatua sita zifuatazo: 1. Chanjo ya Tetanus; 2. Upimaji wa VIH kwa kumlinda mtoto; 3. Chukua kipimo kilichoonyeshwa cha madini ya chuma na folic ili kuepuka anemia; 4. Kuimarisha chakula, sana sana katika miezi 3 ya kwanza ya ujauzito; 5. Tumia chumvi iodized ili kuzuia utoaji mimba mapema au kuzaliwa kabla mtoto kufikia miezi 9; 6. Kulala ndani ya vyandarua vilivyowekwa dawa na kuchukua kipimo kilichoonyeshwa cha dawa ili kuepuka malaria.

promoted_behavior.English: The husband/spouse decides to seek help from a healthcare facility in case of in case of danger signs or childbirth
promoted_behavior.French: Le mari/conjoint décide de recourir au centre de santé dès l'apparition de signes de danger ou d'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mume/mpenzi anajua dalili za hatari za ujauzito na anaelekea kwenye kituo cha afya kwa wakati

promoted_behavior.English: The husband/spouse is supportive of the woman for pregnancy follow-up (communication within the couple, and being aware of one's responsabilities, etc.)
promoted_behavior.French: Le mari/conjoint soutien la femme pour le suivi des grossesses (communication dans le couple, prise de conscience de ses responsabilités, .etc)
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mume/mpenzi anamsaidia mwanamke kwa ufuatiliaji wa ujauzito (mawasiliano katika wanandoa, ufahamu wa majukumu yake, etc.)

problem_behavior: Encourages prohibited food and the use of indigenous products during pregnancy;

promoted_behavior.English: Discourages prohibited food and the use of home remedies during pregnancy. Assisting the pregnant woman in monitoring the four prenatal consultation visits
promoted_behavior.French: Décourage les interdits alimentaires et l'utilisation des produits indigènes chez la femme enceinte. Accompagne la femme enceinte dans le suivi des quatre visites de consultation pré-natale.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Inakataza chakula kilichokatazwa kwa wanawake wajawazito na matumizi ya dawa za asili. Inasaidia mwanamke mjamzito katika ufuatiliaji wa ziara 4 za mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa.

action: Discouragement of the use of prohibited food and indigenous products during pregnancy

message.English: Dear community members, immediately escort the pregnant woman to the nearest health center or hospital as soon as you observe any of the following signs: bleeding, convulsions, fever, loss of amniotic fluid, difficult breathing, severe headaches, severe pain in the lower abdomen, swelling of the face, hands or feet, disappearance or reduction of the baby's movements, disturbance of vision for the sake of your own care and that of your unborn child.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, accompagnez immédiatement la femme enceinte dans un Centre de Santé ou hôpital le plus proche dès que vous observez l’un des signes suivants : saignement, convulsions, fièvre, perte de liquide amniotique, respiration difficile, violents maux de tête, fortes douleurs au bas-ventre, gonflement de visage, des mains ou des pieds, disparition ou diminution des mouvements de bébé, trouble de la vue pour la prise en charge de la femme enceinte et celle de son futur bébé.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, sindikiza mwanamke mjamzito kwenye Kituo cha Afya kilicho karibu au hospitalini unapoona dalili zozote zifuatazo: kutokwa na damu, mtetemeko wa mwili, homa, kupoteza maji, kupumua kwa shida, maumivu makali ya kichwa, maumivu makali chini ya tumbo, uso au mikono au miguu kuvimba, harakati za mtoto zinatoweka au kupunguka, matatizo kuona ili mama na mtoto wapate huduma bora.

problem_behavior: Disregards pregnant women at the PNC.

promoted_behavior.English: Paying attention to the pregnant woman at prenatal consultations (PNC).
promoted_behavior.French: Accorder de l'attention à la femme enceinte à la consultation pré-natale (CPN).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Kujali mwanamke mjamzito katika mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN).

action: Promoting humanized care

message.English: Healthcare providers, give a friendly welcome and humanized care to all pregnant women to encourage them to continue with the use of your services.
message.French: Prestataires, réservez l’accueil convivial et les soins humanisés à toute femme enceinte pour l'encourager à continuer l'utilisation des services.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, karibisheni vizuri wanawake  wajawazito wowote,kuwa tia moyo ili wa endelee kutumia huduma.

problem_behavior: Poor reception of pregnant women at the PNC.

promoted_behavior.English: Make the pregnant woman feel welcome at the prenatal consultation (PNC).
promoted_behavior.French: Réservez un bon accueil à la femme enceinte à la consultation pré-natale (CPN).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Karibisheni vizuri wanawake wajawazito kwa mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN).

action: Discussion and implementation of the delivery plan with the pregnant woman at the PNC.

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, prioritize pregnant women to ensure appropriate emergency care and avoid complications.
message.French: Chers prestataires, faites le tri lors de l'accueil de la femme enceinte pour garantir les soins d'urgence appropriées et lui éviter des complications.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, tangulizeni wanawake wajawazito kuhakikisha huduma sahihi za dharura na kuepuka matatizo.

problem_behavior: Does not discuss the delivery plan with pregnant women at the PNC

promoted_behavior.English: Discusses delivery plan with pregnant women at the prenatal consultation (PNC).
promoted_behavior.French: Discute du plan d'accouchement avec les femmes enceintes à la consultation pré-natale (CPN).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Zungumza na wanawake wajawazito kuhusu mpango wa ku ji fungua katika mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN).

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, discuss the birth plan with the pregnant woman during prenatal consultation (PNC) to ensure a safe delivery for the mother and newborn
message.French: Chers prestataires, discutez du plan d'accouchement avec la femme enceinte pendant la consultation pré-natale (CPN) pour préparer un accouchement sans danger pour la mère et le nouveau-né.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, zungumzeni pamoja na wanawake wajawazito kuhusu mpango wa ku ji fungua katika CPN kujiandaa kwa ku zaa bila matatizo.

problem_behavior: Delay in coming to the facility at the first sign of labor

promoted_behavior.English: Decides to go to the facility on time at the first sign of labor
promoted_behavior.French: Décide de se rendre à temps dans la structure dès l'apparition des premiers signes de travail
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Anaamua kwenda ku kituo cha afya wakati ambapo dalili za kwanza za kuzaa zinaonekana

action: Decision to go to the facility at the first sign of labor

message.English: Pregnant women, as soon as one of the signs of labor appears, go immediately to the health facility for a safe delivery in order to receive quality care and guarantee the survival of your baby.
message.French: Femmes enceintes, dès l'apparition de l'un des signes de travail rendez-vous immédiatement dans   la formation sanitaire pour accoucher en toute sécurité afin de recevoir les soins de qualités et garantir la survie de votre bébé.
message.Swahili: Mwanamke mjamzito mpendwa, ukiona moja katika dalili za kuzaa, enda mara moja katika kituo cha afya ili upate huduma bora na kuhakikisha maisha ya mtoto wako.

problem_behavior: Refusal to go to the facility for delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Agrees to go to the facility for delivery
promoted_behavior.French: Accepte de se rendre dans la structure pour accoucher
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Anakubali kwenda kwenye kituo cha afya kuzaa

action: No use of indigenous products to speed up labor.

message.English: Pregnant women, remind the healthcare provider of the contraceptive method you chose during PNC so that you can use it immediately after delivery
message.French: Femmes enceintes, rappelez au prestataire la méthode contraceptive que vous avez choisi lors de la CPN pour en bénéficier immédiatement après l'accouchement.
message.Swahili: wanawake wajawazito wapendwa ,kumbusheni mtoa huduma njia ya mpango ya uzazi uliyochagua wakati wa CPN kufaidika nayo baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Use of indigenous products to speed up labor;

promoted_behavior.English: Do not use indigenous products to speed up labor
promoted_behavior.French: N'utilise pas des produits indigènes pour accélérer le travail
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Usi tumie dawa za asili kuharakisha kuzaa

action: Decision to go to a health facility on time

message.English: Pregnant women in labor, avoid the use of inappropriate products not prescribed by the healthcare provider that expose you to delivery complications and death
message.French: Femmes enceintes en travail d’accouchement, évitez l'utilisation des produits inadéquats non prescrits par le prestataire qui vous exposent aux complications d’accouchement et au décès.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, wakati wa kuzaa, epukeni matumizi ya dawa bila kupata ushauri kutoka kwa mtaalamu wa afya, dawa hizo zinaweza kusababisha matatizo ya kuzaa na hata kifo.

promoted_behavior.English: Go to a facility that is equipped for delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Rendez-vous dans un établissement équipé pour l'accouchement.
Swahili
Nenda kwenye kituo kilicho na vifaa kwa ajili ya kujifungua.

message.English: Pregnant women, give birth in a well-equipped maternity hospital with qualified personnel to ensure quality care for you and your baby
message.French: Femmes enceintes, accouchez dans une maternité équipée et en présence d'un personnel qualifié pour vous assurer des soins de qualité et ceux de votre bébé.
message.Swahili: Mwanamke mjamzito mpendwa, enda kuzaa katika kituo cha afya yenye vifaa na mbele ya wataalamu wa afya ili kuhakikisha huduma bora wako na mtoto.

problem_behavior: Failure of healthcare provider to refer pregnant women in labor with a complication in time

promoted_behavior.English: Prompt referral of pregnant women in labor with a complication is done by the healthcare provider.
promoted_behavior.French: Le prestataire réfère à temps les femmes enceintes en travail présentant des complications.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mtoa huduma anataja wanawake wajawazito wanao matatizo wakati wa kuzaa kwa wakati.

action: Proper monitoring of a woman in labor

message.English: Clinical care providers, take the time to monitor a woman in labor to detect signs of complications in time to ensure proper management.
message.French: Prestataires cliniques, prenez le temps d'assurer la surveillance d'une femme en travail afin de détecter à temps les signes de complication et d'assurer une prise en charge adéquate.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa wa kliniki, chukueni muda wenu kumfuatilia mwanamke aliye katika kazi ya kuzaa ili kugundua dalili za matatizo kwa wakati na mu hakikishe utunzaji wa kutosha.

promoted_behavior.English: Prompt referral of pregnant women in labor with a complication is done by the healthcare provider.
promoted_behavior.French: Le prestataire réfère à temps les femmes enceintes en travail présentant des complications.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mtoa huduma anataja kwa wakati wanawake wajawazito wanao matatizo wakati wa kuzaa.

message.English: Clinical care providers, prompt referral in case of complications is important to ensure the survival of the pregnant woman and her unborn child.
message.French: Prestataires, il est important de référer la femme enceinte à temps en cas de complication pour garantir sa survie et celle de son futur bébé.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, ni muhimu kutambua kwa wakati matatizo wakati wa kuzaa  ili kuhakikisha maisha ya mwanamke na mtoto wake.

promoted_behavior.English: Prompt referral of pregnant women in labor with a complication is done by the healthcare provider.
promoted_behavior.French: Le prestataire réfère à temps les femmes enceintes en travail présentant des complications.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mtoa huduma anataja kwa wakati wanawake wajawazito wanao matatizo wakati wa kuzaa.

message.English: Clinical care providers, Remember, prompt referral of pregnant women in case of complications is the key to quality care to ensure the survival of the woman and her unborn child
message.French: Prestataires cliniques, attention! La référence à temps de la femme enceinte en cas de complication est l’élément clé des soins de qualité pour assurer la survie de la femme et de son futur bébé.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa wa kliniki, kutambua matatizo wakati wa kuzaa kwa wakati ni muhimu sana kwa huduma bora na pia kuhakikisha maisha ya mwanamke na mtoto wake.

target_audience.French: Femme en post partum immédiat et tardif
target_audience.Swahili: Mwanamke katika postpartum (kipindi cha baada ya kuzaa) ya haraka na ya kuchelewa

problem_behavior: Women in postpartum do not know the danger signs after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Women in postpartum know the danger signs after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes qui ont accouché connaissent les signes de danger après accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake katika postpartum wanajua dalili za hatari baada ya kuzaa.

action: Prompt consultation at the health center in case of any of the danger signs

message.English: Dear women, after delivery, go to the nearest health center as soon as you notice any of the following signs (persistent bleeding, convulsion, fever and chills, foul-smelling vaginal discharge, headaches and anemia) to receive appropriate care
message.French: Chères accouchées, ATTENTION! Chères femmes, après accouchement rendez-vous au centre de santé le plus proche dès que vous constatez l'un des signes ci-dessous (saignement persistant, convulsion, fièvre et frisson, perte vaginales malodorantes maux de tête et anémie) pour bénéficier de soins appropriés.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wapendwa, baada ya kuzaa, nenda kwenye kituo cha afya kilicho karibu unapoona dalili zozote zifuatazo (kutokwa na damu, mtetemeko wa mwili, homa na baridi, kutokwa na harufu ya uke, maumivu ya kichwa na anemia) kupata huduma inayofaa.

target_audience.French: Femme en post partum immédiat et tardif
target_audience.Swahili: Mwanamke katika postpartum (kipindi cha baada ya kuzaa) ya haraka na ya kuchelewa

problem_behavior: Women in postpartum do not use a contraceptive method before leaving the maternity ward

promoted_behavior.English: Women in postpartum use a contraceptive method before leaving the maternity ward
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes accouchées utilisent une méthode contraceptive avant de sortir de la maternité.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake katika postpartum wanatumia njia za  mpango wa uzazi kabla ya kuondoka kituo cha afya.

action: Use of a contraceptive method before leaving the maternity ward

message.English: Dear women, after delivery, use a contraceptive method of your choice after delivery and before leaving the maternity ward to avoid unwanted pregnancies and unsafe pregnancies spacing to ensure your well-being, that of your baby and your family
message.French: Chères accouchées, ATTENTION! Chères femmes, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de votre choix après l'accouchement et avant de quitter la maternité pour éviter les grossesses non désirées et rapprochées. Ceci assurera votre bien être, celui de votre bébé et de votre famille.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wapendwa, baada ya kuzaa, tumieni njia ya mpango wa uzazi ya uchaguzi wenu kabla ya kuondoka katika kituo cha afya ili kuepuka mimba zisizohitajika na ujauzito wa karibu ili kuhakikisha afya bora wako, wa mtoto na  wa familia yako.

intervention.English: Consultation in time for comprehensive abortion care
intervention.French: Consultation à temps pour soins complets d'avortement
intervention.Swahili: Mashauriano kwa wakati kwa utunzaji kamili wa utoaji mimba

problem_behavior: Women who carry unwanted pregnancies have clandestine abortions

promoted_behavior.English: Women with unwanted pregnancies receive comprehensive abortion care in appropriate facilities.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes porteuses des grossesses non désirées bénéficient des soins complets d'avortement dans les structures appropriées.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake walio na mimba zisizohitajika wanapata huduma kamili ya utoaji mimba katika vituo vinavyofaa.

action: Consultation in time for comprehensive abortion care

message.English: Dear pregnant women in need of comprehensive abortion care, go to the nearest health center to receive quality care
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes en cas de besoin des soins complets d’avortement, rendez-vous au centre de santé le plus proche pour y recevoir des soins de qualité.
message.Swahili: Wapendwa wanawake wajawazito wanaohitaji huduma kamili ya utoaji mimba, nenda kwenye kituo cha afya cha karibu ili kupata huduma bora.

intervention.English: Use of comprehensive abortion care services
intervention.French: Utilisation des services des soins complets d'avortement
intervention.Swahili: Matumizi ya huduma kamili za utunzaji wa utoaji mimba

problem_behavior: Women do not know the danger signs after abortion

promoted_behavior.English: Women know the danger signs after abortion
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes connaissent les signes de danger après avortement
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wanajua dalili za hatari baada ya kutoa mimba

action: Use of comprehensive abortion care services

message.English: Pregnant women, use a contraceptive method of your choice after abortion to avoid an unwanted pregnancy
message.French: Femmes enceintes, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de choix après l'avortement pour éviter une grossesse non désirée.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, chagueni njia ya mpango wa uzazi baada ya kutoa mimba ili kuepuka mimba isiyohitajika.

intervention.English: Using contraception as an option after abortion
intervention.French: Utilisation de la contraception au choix après avortement
intervention.Swahili: Kuchagua njia ya kuzuia mimba baada ya utoaji mimba

problem_behavior: Women do not use contraception after abortion

promoted_behavior.English: Women use a contraception of their choice after abortion.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes utilisent la contraception de leur choix après avortement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wanatumia njia za mpango wa uzazi za uchaguzi wao baada ya kutoa mimba.

action: Using contraception as an option after abortion

message.English: Women, use a contraceptive method of your choice after abortion to avoid an unwanted pregnancy and thrive
message.French: Femmes, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de choix après l'avortement pour éviter une grossesse non désirée et de bien s’épanouir.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, chagua njia ya uzazi wa mpango baada ya kutoa mimba ili kuepuka mimba isiyohitajika na kuhakikisha utimilifu wako.

intervention.English: Using contraception as an option after abortion
intervention.French: Utilisation de la contraception au choix après avortement
intervention.Swahili: Kuchagua njia ya kuzuia mimba baada ya utoaji mimba

problem_behavior: The healthcare provider does not give the correct information to women after abortion.

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers properly inform women about comprehensive abortion care, benefits, possible risks, importance of contraception, etc.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires informent correctement les femmes sur les soins complets d'avortement, avantages, risques éventuels, importance de la contraception, etc.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wanajulisha vizuri wanawake kuhusu utunzaji kamili wa utoaji mimba, faida, hatari zinazoweza kujitokeza, umuhimu wa mpango wa uzazi, etc.

action: Provide women with accurate information about comprehensive abortion care - benefits, possible risks, importance of contraception

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, use safe and secure methods of uterine evacuation in case of abortion to avoid complications and ensure good health of the woman.
message.French: Chers prestataires, utilisez des méthodes sûres et sécurisées d’évacuation utérine en cas d'avortement pour éviter les complications et garantir une bonne santé.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, tumieni njia salama za uhamishaji wa uterasi wakati wa utoaji mimba ili kuepuka matatizo na kuhakikisha afya njema kwa wanawake.

intervention.English: Using safe methods of uterine evacuation
intervention.French: Utiliser des méthodes sûres d'évacuation utérine
intervention.Swahili: Kutumia njia salama za uokoaji wa uterasi

problem_behavior: Providers use obsolete uterine evacuation methods (curettage, forced cervical dilation, no pain management, etc.)

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers use safe methods of uterine evacuation (Manual Intra-Uterine Aspiration, misoprostol, mifepristone, pain management, Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs), para cervical block).
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires utilisent des méthodes sécurisées d’évacuation utérine (Aspiration manuelle intra-uterine (AMIU), misoprostol, mifépristone, gérer la douleur, anti-inflammatoires non steroidiens ((AINS), bloc para cervical)
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wanatumia njia salama za kuhamisha uterasi (AMIU, misoprostol, mifepristone, usimamizi wa maumivu, AINS, bloc para cervical).

action: Use of safe methods of uterine evacuation (Manual Intra-Uterine Aspiration, misoprostol, mifepristone, pain management, AINS, para cervical block)

message.English: Dear healthcare provider, use safe methods of uterine evacuation such as manual intra-uterine aspiration, misoprostol, mifepristone, nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs), paracervical block after a miscarriage or abortion.
message.French: Chers prestataires, administrez systématiquement une méthode contraceptive de choix à chaque femme ayant connu un avortement, pour prévenir la survenue d’une grossesse dans les six mois suivant l’avortement et pour prévenir la morbi-mortalité maternelle.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, ni muhimu kupana mashahuri kuhusu njia ya mpango wa uzazi kwa kila mwanamke ambaye alitoa mimba, kuzuia kutokea kwa ujauzito ndani ya miezi sita baada ya utoaji mimba ili kuzuia magonjwa ya uzazi na vifo.

intervention.English: Using contraception as an option after abortion
intervention.French: Utilisation de la contraception au choix après avortement
intervention.Swahili: Kuchagua njia ya kuzuia mimba baada ya utoaji mimba

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers always administer a contraceptive method to all women after abortion care.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires administrent systématiquement à toutes les femmes une méthode contraceptive après les soins d’avortement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma daima wanatoa njia ya mpango wa uzazi kwa wanawake wote baada ya kutoa mimba.

message.English: Dear healthcare provider, systematically administer a contraceptive method of choice to every woman who has had an abortion, to prevent pregnancy within six months of the abortion in order to prevent maternal morbidity and mortality.
message.French: Chers prestataires, administrez systématiquement une méthode contraceptive de choix à chaque femme ayant connu un avortement, pour prévenir la survenue d’une grossesse dans les six mois suivant l’avortement et pour prévenir la morbi-mortalité maternelle.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, ni muhimu kupana mashahuri kuhusu njia ya uzazi wa mpango kwa kila mwanamke ambaye alitoa mimba, kuzuia kutokea kwa ujauzito ndani ya miezi sita baada ya utoaji mimba ili kuzuia magonjwa ya uzazi na vifo.

intervention.English: Using contraception as an option after abortion
intervention.French: Utilisation de la contraception au choix après avortement
intervention.Swahili: Kuchagua njia ya kuzuia mimba baada ya utoaji mimba

problem_behavior: The community stigmatizes women who perform abortions

promoted_behavior.English: The community supports women with unwanted pregnancies for comprehensive abortion care.
promoted_behavior.French: La communauté accompagne les femmes porteuses des grossesses non désirées pour les soins complets d'avortement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Jamii haiwabagui wanawake wanaofanya utoaji mimba.

action: Provide the community with correct information on comprehensive abortion care, benefits, possible risks, importance of contraception, etc.

message.English: Dear community members, let's stand up and fight ignorance, misconceptions and fear towards women who have had abortions in order to avoid stigma, discrimination and rejection within the community
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, levons-nous et combattons l'ignorance, les fausses idées et la peur à l'endroit des femmes ayant avorté afin d’éviter la stigmatisation, la discrimination et le rejet au sein de la communauté.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, tusimame na kupambana na ujinga, mawazo mabaya na hofu ya wanawake ambao wametoa mimba ili kuepuka ubaguzi na kukataliwa ndani ya jamii.

intervention.English: Using contraception as an option after abortion
intervention.French: Utilisation de la contraception au choix après avortement
intervention.Swahili: Kuchagua njia ya kuzuia mimba baada ya utoaji mimba

problem_behavior: The community is not fully informed about the availability of free comprehensive abortion care services (SCACF)

promoted_behavior.English: The community is fully informed about the availability of free comprehensive abortion care services centered on women.
promoted_behavior.French: La communauté est suffisamment informée sur la disponibilité et la gratuité des services des soins complets d’avortement (SCACF).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Jamii inafahamu kikamilifu kuhusu upatikanaji wa huduma za utoaji mimba bure (SCACF).

action: Provide correct information about free comprehensive abortion care services

message.English: Dear community members, kindly escort any woman who has had an abortion to the nearest health center to receive quality care.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, accompagnez toute femme ayant subi un avortement au centre de santé le plus proche pour y recevoir des soins de qualité.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, msindikizeni mwanamke yeyote ambaye ametoa mimba katika kituo cha afya kilicho karibu ili kupata huduma bora.

intervention.English: Using contraception as an option after abortion
intervention.French: Utilisation de la contraception au choix après avortement
intervention.Swahili: Kuchagua njia ya kuzuia mimba baada ya utoaji mimba

promoted_behavior.English: The community is fully informed about the availability of free comprehensive abortion care services centered on women.
promoted_behavior.French: La communauté est suffisamment informée sur la disponibilité et la gratuité des services des soins complets d’avortement (SCACF).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Jamii inafahamu kikamilifu kuhusu upatikanaji wa huduma za utoaji mimba bure (SCACF).

message.English: Dear community members, abortion care services are important and available, for all cases of unsafe abortion go to the health center to receive appropriate care.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, les services de soins d’avortement sont importants et mis à la disposition des femmes. Pour tout cas d'avortement non sécurisé, rendez-vous au centre de santé pour recevoir les soins appropriés.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, huduma za utoaji mimba ni muhimu na zinapatikana kwa bure, kwa kesi zote za utoaji mimba usio salama nenda katika kituo cha afya kupata huduma bora.

problem_behavior: Does not provide the newborn with basic care

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare provider always provides the newborn with complete basic care.
promoted_behavior.French: Le prestataire administre systématiquement les soins essentiels complets au nouveau-né.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mtoa huduma daima ana mpatia mtoto mchanga huduma kamili ya msingi.

action: Systematic administration of complete basic care to the newborn

message.English: Dear providers, always provide the newborn with complete basic care for good survival.
message.French: Chers prestataires, administrez systématiquement les soins essentiels complet au nouveau-né pour lui permettre une bonne survie.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, daima mpe mtoto mchanga huduma kamili ya msingi kwa maisha yake mazuri.

problem_behavior: Does not exclusively breastfeed the baby

promoted_behavior.English: The mother exclusively breastfeeds the baby.
promoted_behavior.French: La maman allaite exclusivement le bébé au sein.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mama ana tumia maziwa ya kifua pekee kumlisha mtoto.

action: Exclusive breastfeeding

message.English: Dear mothers, exclusively breastfeed your baby after delivery to ensure good health and prevent unsafe pregnancy spacing.
message.French: Chères accouchées/chères femmes, après accouchement allaitez exclusivement votre bébé au sein afin de lui assurer la bonne santé et prévenir une grossesse rapprochée.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wapendwa, baada ya kuzaa tumieni maziwa ya kifua pekee ili kuhakikisha afya njema ya mtoto wako na kuzuia mimba ya karibu.

promoted_behavior.English: The mother exclusively breastfeeds the baby.
promoted_behavior.French: La maman allaite exclusivement le bébé au sein.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mama ana tumia maziwa ya kifua pekee kumlisha mtoto.

message.English: Parents, breast milk is the only natural, complete and adapted food for your baby, exclusively breastfeed him from birth until he is six months old.
message.French: Parents, le lait maternel est le seul aliment naturel, complet et adapté à votre bébé, nourrissez-le exclusivement au sein dès la naissance jusqu’à l’âge de six mois.
message.Swahili: Wazazi wapendwa, maziwa ya mama pekee ni chakula bora inayo tosha ku mlisha mtoto wako tangu kuzaliwa mpaka ana eneza miezi sita.

problem_behavior: Do not sleep under the LLIN, leaving the baby exposed to bad weather

promoted_behavior.English: The mother and the baby sleep under the Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN).
promoted_behavior.French: L’accouchée et le bébé dorment sous la moustiquaire imprégnée d’insecticide (MILD).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Analala ndani ya chandarua kilichowekwa dawa kumkinga mtoto na magonjwa.

action: Proper use of the LLIN

message.English: Parents, sleeping under Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN) every night will protect you and your family from bites of mosquitoes that transmit malaria.
message.French: Parents, dormez et faites dormir, chaque nuit, tous les membres de votre famille sous la moustiquaire imprégnée d’insecticide à longue durée (MILD) pour les protéger contre les piqûres des moustiques qui transmettent la malaria.
message.Swahili: Wazazi wapendwa, laleni na lalisheni kila usiku wa toto na familia yenu ndani ya chandarua iliyo wekwa dawa ya Kudumu Muda Mrefu (MILD) kwa kuwakinga na malaria.

problem_behavior: Do not go to the HC as soon as the newborn shows danger signs

promoted_behavior.English: Go to healthcare facility as soon as the newborn shows signs of danger.
promoted_behavior.French: Rendez-vous dans un centre de santé dès que le nouveau-né montre des signes de danger.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Nenda kwenye kituo cha afya mara tu mtoto mchanga anapoonyesha dalili za hatari.

action: Taking care of the newborn at home (protecting the baby from heat, cold and dressing the baby

message.English: Parents, bring your baby immediately to the health center as soon as you detect any of the following infant danger signs: refusal to suck, moving less or being inactive, non-stop crying, fever, breathing difficulties and diarrhea, cough, cold, convulsions...
message.French: Parents, amenez immédiatement votre bébé au centre de santé dès que vous décelez ne serait-ce qu’un des signes de danger suivants chez le nourrisson : refus de téter, bouge moins ou est inactif, pleures incessants, fièvre, difficultés respiratoires, diarrhée, toux, rhume et convulsions.
message.Swahili: Wazazi wapendwa, peleka mtoto kwenye kituo cha afya ukiona dalili za hatari zifwatazo : kukataa nyonya, kutingizika kidogo, kulia sana, homa, kupumua kwa shida, kukohoa, kutetemeka.

promoted_behavior.English: Protects the baby from bad weather.
promoted_behavior.French: Protège le bébé contre les intempéries.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Ana mkinga mtoto na hali mbaya ya hewa.

message.English: Parents, take good care of the newborn at home, protect the baby against heat, smoke, cold and dress him properly to ensure his healthy growth and avoid illness
message.French: Parents, prenez bien soins du nouveau-né à la maison, protégez le contre la chaleur, la fumée, le froid et habillez-le convenablement afin de lui garantir une bonne croissance et lui éviter de tomber malade.
message.Swahili: Wazazi wapendwa, inawaomba kumkinga mtoto nyumbani, mvalishe mavazi inayo faa ili asipate homa ama baridi, na epuka moshi ili asipate magonjwa.

promoted_behavior.English: Go to healthcare facility as soon as the newborn shows signs of danger.
promoted_behavior.French: Rendez-vous dans un centre de santé dès que le nouveau-né montre des signes de danger.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Nenda kwenye kituo cha afya mara tu mtoto mchanga anapoonyesha dalili za hatari.

message.English: Take your baby to the health center immediately if any of the following infant danger signs are detected. The infant is having convulsions, has a distended abdomen or is vomiting whatever he or she swallows, has a foul odor around the navel or the cord is red.
message.French: Amenez immédiatement votre bébé au centre de santé dès que vous décelez ne serait-ce qu’un des signes de danger suivants chez le nourrisson : le nourrisson a des convulsions, a un abdomen distendu ou vomit tout ce qu’il avale, a une odeur nauséabonde au niveau de son nombril ou la base du cordon est rouge.
message.Swahili: Mbebe mtoto kwenye kituo cha afya kwa haraka ukiona dalili za hatari zifwatazo : mtoto anatetemeka sana, anatapika yote anayo meza, harufu mbaya inatoka kwenye kitofu chake.

promoted_behavior.English: Go to healthcare facility as soon as the newborn shows signs of danger.
promoted_behavior.French: Rendez-vous dans un centre de santé dès que le nouveau-né montre des signes de danger.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Nenda kwenye kituo cha afya mara tu mtoto mchanga anapoonyesha dalili za hatari.

message.English: Parents, as soon as your child is having convulsions, repeated vomiting, refuses to suck or eat, or goes into coma, take him/her immediately to the referral health center or hospital for appropriate care.
message.French: Parents, dès que votre enfant convulse, vomis à répétition, refuse de téter ou de manger ou entre en comma, amenez-le immédiatement au Centre de Santé de référence ou à l'hôpital pour y recevoir des soins appropriés.
message.Swahili: Wazazi wapendwa, mtoto akitetemeka sana, ama anatapika mara mingi, akikataa ku nyonya ama kukula, mbebe kwa haraka kwenye kituo cha afya ama hospitalini ili kupata huduma bora.

promoted_behavior.English: Wash hands before and after nursing the newborn.
promoted_behavior.French: Se laver les mains avant et après les soins du nouveau-né.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Osha mikono kabla na baada ya utunzaji wa watoto wachanga.

message.English: Mother, wash your hands before and after nursing the newborn.
message.French: Femmes, lavez-vous les mains avant et après les soins du nouveau-né.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wapendwa, osheni mikono yenu kabla na baada ya utunzaji wa watoto wachanga.

target_audience.English: Sexually active woman of childbearing age, married or not
target_audience.French: Femme en âge de procréer sexuellement active mariée ou non
target_audience.Swahili: Mwanamke wa umri wa kuzaa, aliyeolewa au asiyeolewa

problem_behavior: Unwanted pregnancies

promoted_behavior.English: Women of childbearing age use contraception of their choice
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes en âge de procréer utilisent la contraception de leur choix.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wa umri wa kuzaa wanatumia njia za uzazi wa mpango za uchaguzi wao.

action: Use of contraceptive method of choice.

message.English: Dear women of childbearing age, use a contraceptive method of your choice to avoid too many early and late pregnancies to ensure your health and your family well-being.
message.French: Chères femmes en âge de procréer, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de votre choix pour éviter les grossesses trop nombreuses, trop rapprochées, trop précoces et trop tardives pour assurer votre santé et le bien-être familial.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wapendwa wa umri wa kuzaa, tumieni njia ya uzazi wa mpango ya uchaguzi wenu ili kuepuka mimba nyingi za mapema na za kuchelewa ili kuhakikisha afya yenu na ustawi wa familia yenu.

target_audience.English: Sexually active woman of childbearing age, married or not
target_audience.French: Femme en âge de procréer sexuellement active mariée ou non
target_audience.Swahili: Mwanamke wa umri wa kuzaa, aliyeolewa au asiyeolewa

problem_behavior: Practice of clandestine abortions 3/ Pregnancies that are too close.

promoted_behavior.English: Women use contraception of their choice after abortion
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes utilisent la contraception de leur choix après avortement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wanatumia njia za kuzuia mimba baada ya utoaji mimba.

message.English: Get informed about contraceptive methods from trained providers and health facilities to help you make an informed choice and use a safe and appropriate method. Dear partners, encourage your wives to use the contraceptive methods of their choice for their health and family well-being. Dear women of childbearing age, use a modern contraceptive method of your choice to avoid resorting to unsafe abortions
message.French: Chères femmes en âge de procréer bénéficiez des informations sur les méthodes contraceptives auprès des prestataires formés et dans les FOSA pour vous aider à faire un choix éclairé. Utilisez une méthode sûre et adaptée. Chers partenaires, encouragez vos femmes à utiliser les méthodes contraceptives de leurs choix pour leur santé et le bien-être familial. Chères femmes en âge de procréer, utilisez une méthode contraceptive moderne de votre choix pour éviter de recourir aux avortements non sécurisés.
message.Swahili: Pata taarifa kuhusu njia za uzazi wa mpango kutoka kwa watoa huduma waliofunzwa na vituo vya afya ili kukusaidia kufanya uchaguzi mzuri na kutumia njia salama na inayofaa. Waume wapendwa, wahimize wake wenu kutumia njia za uzazi wa mpango za uchaguzi wao kwa afya zao na ustawi wa familia. Wanawake wapendwa wa umri wa kuzaa, tumia njia ya kisasa ya uzazi wa mpango wa uchaguzi wako ili kuepuka kutumia utoaji mimba usio salama.

promoted_behavior.English: The mother complies with the vaccination schedule.
promoted_behavior.French: L’accouchée respecte le calendrier vaccinal.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Anaheshimu ratiba ya chanjo.

message.English: 1. We should vaccinate our children at birth, 1.5 months, 2.5 months, 3.5 months and 9 months to protect them against tuberculosis, polio, diphtheria, pertussis, hepatitis B, meningitis, pneumonia, yellow fever and measles.
message.French: 1. Faisons vacciner nos enfants à la naissance, à 1 mois et demi, à 2 mois et demi; à 3 mois et demi et à 9 mois pour les protéger contre la tuberculose, la polio, la diphtérie, la coqueluche, l'hépatite B, la méningite, la pneumonie, la fièvre jaune et la rougeole.
message.Swahili: 1. Hebu tuwachanje watoto wetu wakati wa kuzaliwa, mwezi 1 na nusu, 2 na nusu; katika miezi 3 na nusu na 9 ya kuwalinda na magonjwa ya tuberculose, polio, diphtérie, coqueluche, hépatite B, méningite, pneumonie, fièvre jaune na rougeole.

promoted_behavior.English: The mother complies with the vaccination schedule.
promoted_behavior.French: L’accouchée respecte le calendrier vaccinal.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Anaheshimu ratiba ya chanjo.

message.English: 2. Have your child vaccinated 5 times before his or her first birthday to protect against vaccine-preventable diseases.
message.French: 2. Faites vacciner votre enfant 5 fois avant son premier anniversaire pour le protéger contre les maladies évitables par la vaccination.
message.Swahili: 2. mtoto wako achanjwe mara 5 kabla ya siku yao ya kwanza ya kuzaliwa kuwalinda na magonjwa yanayozuilika na chanjo.

intervention.French: Prise en charge des effets secondaires
intervention.Swahili: Usimamizi wa matatizo zinazotokea katika matumizi ya njia za kuzuia mimba

target_audience.Swahili: Mwanamke atumia njia ya kuzuia mimba

problem_behavior: Discontinuation of the method due to side effects or rumors

promoted_behavior.English: Women with side effects consult a qualified provider before discontinuing the method.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes ayant des effets secondaires consultent un prestataire qualifié avant l'arrêt de la méthode.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake walio na matatizo wanatafuta mashauriano kwa mtaalamu wa afya kabla ya kuacha njia ya kuzuia mimba.

action: Timely consultation at the health center in case of side effects that bother the woman

message.English: In case of side effects that bother you, go to the health center and immediately consult a trained provider to benefit from the appropriate care.
message.French: Chères utilisatrices des méthodes contraceptives, en cas d’effets secondaires qui vous gênent, rendez-vous au centre de santé et consultez immédiatement un prestataire formé pour bénéficier des soins appropriés.
message.Swahili: Watumiaji wapendwa wa njia za uzazi wa mpango, ikiwa kuna matatizo ambayo yanakusumbua unaenda kwenye kituo cha afya na mara moja wasiliana na mtaalamu wa afya kupata huduma inayofaa.

intervention.English: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
intervention.French: Utilisation des méthodes contraceptives en post partum
intervention.Swahili: Matumizi ya njia za kuzuia mimba baada ya kuzaa

problem_behavior: The pregnant woman is not adequately informed at the PNC about the importance of using contraceptive methods after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: The pregnant woman is adequately informed at the prenatal consultation (PNC) about the importance of using contraceptive methods after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: La femme enceinte est suffisamment informée à la consultation pré-natale (CPN) sur l'importance de l'utilisation des méthodes contraceptives après l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mwanamke mjamzito anafahamishwa vya kutosha na mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) kuhusu umuhimu wa kutumia njia za uzazi wa mpango baada ya kuzaa.

action: Informing pregnant women about the use of contraceptive methods

message.English: Pregnant women, go to prenatal consultations. In addition to monitoring your pregnancy, you will get information and counseling on contraceptive methods to use immediately after delivery. This will allow you to avoid the occurrence of an unwanted pregnancy, ensure good health and family well-being. Warning: Ask the provider about contraceptive options to be used immediately after delivery to avoid early pregnancy and ensure your health, your baby's health, and your family's well-being.
message.French: Femmes enceintes, allez à la CPN. En plus du suivi de votre grossesse, vous bénéficierez des informations et des conseils sur les méthodes contraceptives à utiliser immédiatement après l’accouchement. Cela vous permettra d’éviter la survenue d'une grossesse non désirée, garantir la bonne santé et le bien-être familial. Chères femmes enceintes, attention! Sollicitez auprès du prestataire les options contraceptives à utiliser immédiatement après l'accouchement pour éviter la survenue d'une grossesse trop rapprochée et garantir votre santé, celle de votre bébé et le bien-être de votre famille.
message.Swahili: Wapendwa wanawake wajawazito, nenda kwenye CPN. Mbali na kufuatilia ujauzito wako, utafaidika na taarifa na ushauri juu ya njia za kutumia ili kuzuia mimba  baada ya kuzaa. Hii itakuruhusu kuepuka tukio la ujauzito usiohitajika, kuhakikisha afya nzuri na ustawi wa familia. Wapendwa wanawake wajawazito, Kuwa mwangalifu! Muulize mtaalamu wa afya kuhusu njia za uzazi wa mpango ambazo unaweza ku tumia baada ya kujifungua ili kuepuka mwanzo wa ujauzito ambao uko karibu sana na kuhakikisha afya yako, ya mtoto wako na ustawi wa familia yako.

intervention.English: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
intervention.French: Utilisation des méthodes contraceptives en post partum
intervention.Swahili: Matumizi ya njia za kuzuia mimba baada ya kuzaa

promoted_behavior.English: The pregnant woman is adequately informed at the prenatal consultation (PNC) about the importance of using contraceptive methods after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: La femme enceinte est suffisamment informée à la consultation pré-natale (CPN) sur l'importance de l'utilisation des méthodes contraceptives après l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mwanamke mjamzito anafahamishwa vya kutosha na mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) kuhusu umuhimu wa kutumia njia za uzazi wa mpango baada ya kuzaa.

message.English: Pregnant women, using a safe and effective contraceptive method after delivery helps you ensure the development and health of the mother-child couple and the well-being of the entire family.
message.French: Femmes enceintes, l'utilisation d'une méthode contraceptive sûre et efficace après l'accouchement vous aide à garantir l'épanouissement, la santé du couple mère-enfant et le bien-être de toute la famille.
message.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wapendwa, kutumia njia salama ya uzazi wa mpango baada ya kuzaa inakusaidia kuhakikisha utimilifu wako, afya ya wanandoa na ustawi wa familia nzima.

intervention.English: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
intervention.French: Utilisation des méthodes contraceptives en post partum
intervention.Swahili: Matumizi ya njia za kuzuia mimba baada ya kuzaa

target_audience.English: Healthcare provider to women in labor in the latency phase
target_audience.French: Prestataire auprès de la femme en travail en phase de latence
target_audience.Swahili: Mtoa huduma kwa wanawake wakati wa kuzaa katika phase ya latence

problem_behavior: The healthcare provider does not check with the woman in labor for information on the choice of contraception

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare provider checks with the woman in labor for information on contraceptive choice
promoted_behavior.French: Le prestataire vérifie l'information sur le choix préalable de la contraception auprès de la femme en travail.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Mtoa huduma anauliza habari kuhusu uchaguzi wa uzazi wa mpango wa mwanamke wakati wa kuzaa.

action: Systematic checking of information on prior contraceptive choice with the woman in labor

message.English: Always check the information on the choice of contraception with the woman in labor so that she can benefit from the chosen method at the prenatal consultation (PNC) if necessary.
message.French: Prestataires, vérifiez systématiquement l'information sur le choix préalable de la contraception auprès de la femme en travail pour lui permettre de bénéficier de la méthode choisie à la consultation pré-natale (CPN) le cas échéant.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, kwa utaratibu angalia taarifa juu ya uchaguzi wa njia ya uzazi wa mpango wa mwanamke wakati wa kuzaa ili kumruhusu kufaidika na njia iliyochaguliwa katika CPN ikiwa ni lazima.

intervention.English: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
intervention.French: Utilisation des méthodes contraceptives en post partum
intervention.Swahili: Matumizi ya njia za kuzuia mimba baada ya kuzaa

target_audience.English: Healthcare provider to women in labor in the latency phase
target_audience.French: Prestataire auprès de la femme en travail en phase de latence
target_audience.Swahili: Mtoa huduma kwa wanawake wakati wa kuzaa katika phase ya latence

problem_behavior: Healthcare providers do not give contraceptive counseling to women in labor

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare provider gives contraceptive counseling to the woman in labor.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires fait le counseling sur la contraception auprès de la femme en travail.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wanapana ushauri wa uzazi wa mpango kwa wanawake wakati wa kuzaa.

action: Systematic initiation of contraceptive counseling for women in labor who have not yet chosen a contraceptive method

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, initiate contraceptive counseling with the woman in labor so that she can benefit from a method of her choice for her health, her baby's health and the family's well-being
message.French: Chers prestataires, initiez le counseling sur la contraception auprès de la femme en travail d’accouchement afin qu'elle bénéficie d'une méthode de son choix pour sa santé, celle de son bébé et le bien-être familial.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, fanya ushauri wa uzazi wa mpango kwa mwanamke wakati wa kuzaa ili awe na njia ya kuchagua kwa afya yake, ile ya mtoto wake na ustawi wa familia yake.

intervention.French: Violences Sexuelles et Basées sur le Genre (SGBV)

target_audience.English: Survivor of Sexual and Gender-Based violence (SGBV)
target_audience.French: Survivant des violences sexuelles basées sur le genre

problem_behavior: Do not denounce the damage suffered

promoted_behavior.English: Report any case of violence
promoted_behavior.French: Dénoncer tout cas de violence.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Ripoti kesi yoyote ya ubakaji.

action: Reporting all cases of rape

message.English: I, a survivor of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV), denounce the abuses I suffered, demand proper care and prosecution of the perpetrator.
message.French: Moi, survivant des violences sexuelles basées sur le genre, je dénonce les abus dont j'ai fait l'objet, demande une prise en charge correcte et les poursuites de mon bourreau.
message.Swahili: Mimi, mwathirika wa unyanyasaji wa kijinsia, ninaripoti unyanyasaji ambao ume ni tesa, ninaomba huduma na kumshtaki mtu aliye ni baka.

intervention.French: Violences Sexuelles et Basées sur le Genre (SGBV)

problem_behavior: Stigmatizes the victim of sexual violence

promoted_behavior.English: Stop stigmatizing the victim of sexual violence.
promoted_behavior.French: Arrête de stigmatiser la victime de violence sexuelle.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Kukomesha ubaguzi ya waathirika wa unyanyasaji wa kijinsia.

action: Promotion of care services for survivors of SGBV victims

message.English: Dear community members, DO NOT stigmatize survivors of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV). Encourage them to report and assist them in getting better care.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, ATTENTION! Évitez de stigmatiser les survivants de violence sexuelle basée sur le genre. Encouragez-les à dénoncer et accompagnez-les pour une meilleure prise en charge.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, epuka ubaguzi ya waathirika wa unyanyasaji wa kijinsia. Wahimize kuripoti unyanyasaji na kuwasaidia kupata huduma bora.

intervention.French: Violences Sexuelles et Basées sur le Genre (SGBV)

problem_behavior: Fails to provide timely and appropriate care to the survivor of SGBV.

promoted_behavior.English: Provides timely and appropriate care to the survivor of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV).
promoted_behavior.French: Administre les soins appropriés à temps au survivant des violences sexuelles basées sur le genre.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Anatoa huduma sahihi kwa wakati kwa mwathirika wa unyanyasaji ya kijinsia (SGBV).

action: Holistic care for survivors of SGBV.

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, listen to survivors of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV) and provide them with adequate care to facilitate their social reintegration.
message.French: Chers prestataires, écoutez-les, offrez aux survivants de violence sexuelle basée sur le genre une prise en charge adéquate pour faciliter leur réinsertion sociale.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wa afya wapendwa, sikilizeni waathirika  wa unyanyasaji ya kijinsia (SGBV) na wapeni huduma za kutosha ili kuwezesha kurudi kwao ndani ya jamii.

intervention.French: Prise en charge de fistule urogénitale

problem_behavior: Harmful and inappropriate practices (non-use of partograms during labor monitoring, Christeller maneuver, ...)

promoted_behavior.English: Applies recommended practices (use of partograms during labor monitoring, etc.)
promoted_behavior.French: Applique les pratiques recommandées (utilisation des partogrammes pendant la surveillance du travail d'accouchement, etc.)
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Tumia mazoea yaliyopendekezwa (matumizi ya partograms wakati wa ufuatiliaji wa kuzaa, etc.)

action: Application of recommended practices to save women's lives (use of partograms during labor monitoring, ...)

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, please follow recommended practices in the management of women in labor. Use partograms during labor monitoring to avoid complications and death of mother and baby.
message.French: Chers prestataires, veillez à l'application des pratiques recommandées dans la prise en charge des femmes en travail d’accouchement. Utilisez des partogrammes pendant la surveillance du travail d’accouchement pour éviter les complications et le décès de la mère et de son bébé.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, tafadhali tumia mazoea yaliyopendekezwa katika utunzaji wa wanawake wakati wa kuzaa. Tumia partograms wakati wa ufuatiliaji wa kuzaa ili kuepuka matatizo na kifo cha mama na mtoto wake.

intervention.French: Prise en charge de fistule urogénitale

problem_behavior: Fistula patients hide and are ashamed

promoted_behavior.English: Do not hide, go to the health facility for appropriate care.
promoted_behavior.French: Ne pas se cacher, se rendre dans les formation sanitaire (FOSA) pour la prise en charge appropriée.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Usijifiche, nenda kwenye kituo cha afya kwa ajili ya huduma inayofaa.

action: Consultation in health facilities to benefit from fistula repair

message.English: Women with urogenital fistulas, come out of hiding to receive proper care and improve your health.
message.French: Porteuses de fistules urogénitales, sortez de la clandestinité pour recevoir les soins appropriés et améliorer votre état de santé.
message.Swahili: Wapendwa wanawake wenye fistule urogénitale epuka kujificha, kuja kupata huduma sahihi na kuboresha afya yako.

intervention.French: Prise en charge de fistule urogénitale

problem_behavior: Stigmatization of fistula patients

promoted_behavior.English: Stop stigmatizing urogenital fistula patients.
promoted_behavior.French: Arrêter de stigmatiser les porteuses des fistules urogénitales.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Kukomesha ubaguzi wa wanawake wenye fistule urogénitale.

action: Assisting patients with urogenital fistulas in the repair process

message.English: Dear community members, DO NOT stigmatize patients with urogenital fistulas, but encourage them to seek medical attention and provide timely support for the repair process so that they can regain their well-being.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, ATTENTION! Évitez de stigmatiser les porteuses des fistules urogénitales, par contre encouragez-les à consulter et accompagnez-les à temps pour la réparation afin de retrouver le bien-être.
message.Swahili: Wapendwa wanawake wenye fistule urogénitale epuka kujificha, kuja kupata huduma sahihi na kuboresha afya yako.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.
intervention.French: Mise au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
intervention.Swahili: Ku nyonyesha ndani ya saa moja baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Some pregnant women do not comply with the 4 PNC visits to receive counseling on the benefits of breastfeeding immediately after delivery or do not observe breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women comply with the prenatal consultation (PNC) to receive counseling on the benefits of breastfeeding their newborns immediately after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes respectent  la consultation pré-natale(CPN) pour recevoir  les conseils sur les avantages de mettre le nouveau-né au sein immédiatement après l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wana heshimu ziara za Mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) kupata ushauri juu ya faida za kumnyonyesha mtoto baada ya kuzaa.

message.English: Pregnant woman, go to the prenatal consultation (PNC) to get information and counseling on breastfeeding your newborn immediately after delivery, to ensure your well-being and that of your newborn.
message.French: Femme enceinte, allez à la consultation pré-natale (CPN), pour bénéficier des informations et des conseils sur la mise au sein du nouveau-né immédiatement après l’accouchement, pour assurer votre bien-être et celui du nouveau-né.
message.Swahili: Mwanamke mjamzito mpendwa, nenda Mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) kupata taarifa na ushauri juu ya kumnyonyesha mtoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa, kuhakikisha ustawi wako na ule wa mtoto wako

intervention.English: Breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.
intervention.French: Mise au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
intervention.Swahili: Ku nyonyesha ndani ya saa moja baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Some women are not provided with information on breastfeeding immediately after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Women receive information about breastfeeding their newborns immediately after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes bénéficient des informations sur la mise au sein des nouveau-nés immédiatement après l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana faidika na taarifa juu ya kunyonyesha watoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa.

message.English: Mother, breastfeed your baby immediately after delivery, it contributes to your good health and that of your baby.
message.French: Maman, mettez votre bébé au sein immédiatement après l’accouchement, cela contribue à votre bonne santé et celle de votre bébé.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, nyonyesha mtoto wako mara tu baada ya kuzaa kwa afya yako nzuri na ya mtoto wako.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.
intervention.French: Mise au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
intervention.Swahili: Ku nyonyesha ndani ya saa moja baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Some women are not provided with information on breastfeeding immediately after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Women receive information about breastfeeding their newborns immediately after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes bénéficient des informations sur la mise au sein des nouveau-nés immédiatement après l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana faidika na taarifa juu ya kunyonyesha watoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa.

message.English: Mother, breastfeed your newborn immediately after birth to quickly stimulate the production of breast milk, this first yellowish milk (colostrum), gives a natural protection to the newborn against diseases. Don't throw it away, give it to your newborn quickly.
message.French: Maman, donnez le sein à votre nouveau-né dès sa naissance pour stimuler rapidement la production du lait maternel, ce premier lait jaunâtre (colostrum), donne une protection naturelle au nouveau-né contre les maladies. Ne le jetez pas, donnez-le vite à votre nouveau-né.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, nyonyesha mtoto wako anapo zaliwa ili kusaidia  kutoka kwa maziwa ya matiti (maziba), maziwa haya ya kwanza ya manjano (colostrum), inatoa kinga ya asili kwa mtoto aliye zaliwa  na ina mu epusha na magonjwa. Usiitupe, uipe haraka mtoto wako.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.
intervention.French: Mise au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
intervention.Swahili: Ku nyonyesha ndani ya saa moja baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Some women are not provided with information on breastfeeding immediately after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Women receive information about breastfeeding their newborns immediately after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes bénéficient des informations sur la mise au sein des nouveau-nés immédiatement après l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana faidika na taarifa juu ya kunyonyesha watoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa.

message.English: Mother, breastfeeding your baby immediately after delivery facilitates the expulsion of the placenta and reduces bleeding.
message.French: Maman, allaiter votre bébé immédiatement après l’accouchement facilite l‘expulsion du placenta et diminue les saignements.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, kumnyonyesha mtoto wako mara tu baada ya kuzaa ina wezesha kufukuzwa kwa plasenta na ina maliza kupungukwa damu.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.
intervention.French: Mise au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
intervention.Swahili: Ku nyonyesha ndani ya saa moja baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Some men do not encourage or support their wives to attend PNC appointments for information and counseling on breastfeeding newborns immediately after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Men encourage and support their wives to attend prenatal consultation (PNC) appointments to receive information and counseling on breastfeeding newborns immediately after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Les hommes encouragent et soutiennent leurs femmes à se rendre au rendez-vous de la consultation pré-natale (CPN) pour bénéficier des informations et des conseils sur la mise au sein des nourrissons immédiatement après l’accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanaume wana himiza na kuwasaidia wake zao kwenda Mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) kupokea taarifa na ushauri juu ya kunyonyesha watoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa.

message.English: Husband/Spouse, encourage and support your wives to attend prenatal consultation (PNC) appointments to get information and counseling on breastfeeding the newborn immediately after delivery for the well-being of the family.
message.French: Mari/Conjoint, encouragez et soutenez vos femmes aux rendez-vous de la consultation pré-natale(CPN) pour bénéficier des informations et des conseils sur la mise au sein du nouveau-né immédiatement après l’accouchement pour le bien-être de la famille.
message.Swahili: Mume/Mpenzi Mpendwa, muhimize na kuunga mkono mke wako katika mikutano ya Mashauriano ya kabla ya kuzaa (CPN) kupokea taarifa na ushauri juu ya kumnyonyesha mtoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa kwa ajili ya ustawi wa familia

intervention.English: Breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.
intervention.French: Mise au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
intervention.Swahili: Ku nyonyesha ndani ya saa moja baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Some healthcare providers do not assist or encourage breastfeeding women to breastfeed their newborns immediately after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers assist and encourage women to breastfeed their newborns within one hour after delivery
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires aident et encouragent les femmes à mettre les nouveau-nés au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wana saidia na kuhimiza wanawake kunyonyesha watoto wachanga ndani ya saa moja ya kuzaa.

message.English: Healthcare providers, make sure you support and encourage women to breastfeed their newborns immediately after delivery for the sake of our community.
message.French: Prestataires, prenez soin d’aider et d’encourager les femmes à mettre au sein le nouveau-né immédiatement après l'accouchement pour le bien être de notre communauté.
message.Swahili: Wapendwa watoa huduma, tafadhali wasaidie na kuwahimiza wanawake kumnyonyesha mtoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa kwa ajili ya ustawi wa jamii yetu.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding within one hour after delivery.
intervention.French: Mise au sein dans l'heure qui suit l'accouchement.
intervention.Swahili: Ku nyonyesha ndani ya saa moja baada ya kuzaa.

problem_behavior: Community members do not encourage breastfeeding women to breastfeed their newborns immediately after delivery.

promoted_behavior.English: Community members encourage breastfeeding women to breastfeed their newborns immediately after delivery.
promoted_behavior.French: Les membres de la communauté incitent les femmes allaitantes à mettre au sein le nouveau-né immédiatement après l’accouchement.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanajamii wana himiza wanawake wanaonyonyesha kumnyonyesha mtoto mara tu baada ya kuzaa.

message.English: Community members, encourage the breastfeeding woman to breastfeed the newborn immediately after delivery for their good health.
message.French: Membres de la communauté, encouragez la femme allaitante à mettre au sein le nouveau-né immédiatement après l’accouchement pour leur bonne santé.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, mhimize mwanamke anayenyonyesha kumnyonyesha mtoto mchanga mara tu baada ya kuzaa ili kuhakikisha afya njema.

problem_behavior: Women do not respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding of their babies.

promoted_behavior.English: Women respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes respectent l'allaitement exclusif et régulier.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana heshimu unyonyeshaji wa kipekee na wa kawaida wa watoto wao.

message.English: Mother, breast milk is the only natural, complete and adapted food that meets 100% of your baby's needs. Feed your baby exclusively and regularly from birth until the age of six months. Do not give anything even water, breast milk also contains water.
message.French: Maman, le lait maternel est le seul aliment naturel, complet, adapté répondant à 100% aux besoins de votre bébé, nourrissez-le exclusivement et régulièrement au sein dès la naissance jusqu’à l’âge de six mois. Ne donnez rien même pas de l'eau, le lait maternel contient aussi l’eau.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, maziwa ya matiti (maziba) ni chakula pekee cha asili, kamili, kinachofaa ambacho ina kutana na 100% ya mahitaji ya mtoto wako, kumlisha peke yake na mara kwa mara kwenye matiti tangu kuzaliwa hadi umri wa miezi sita. Usimpe maji, maziwa ya mama pia yana maji.

problem_behavior: Women do not respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding of their babies.

promoted_behavior.English: Women respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes respectent l'allaitement exclusif et régulier.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana heshimu unyonyeshaji wa kipekee na wa kawaida wa watoto wao.

message.English: Mother, exclusively breastfeed your baby for the first 6 months to protect him/her from diseases such as diarrhea, respiratory infections and also to prevent unwanted or early pregnancies, risk of ovarian and breast cancer.
message.French: Maman, allaitez exclusivement votre bébé pendant les 6 premiers mois pour le protéger contre les maladies telles que la diarrhée, les infections respiratoires et aussi prévenir les grossesses non désirées ou précoces, le risque de cancer des ovaires et des seins.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, mtoto wako anahitaji unyonyeshaji wa kipekee kwa miezi 6 ya kwanza ili kumkinga na magonjwa kama vile kuharisha, maambukizi ya kupumua pamoja na kuzuia mimba zisizohitajika au mapema, hatari ya cancer ya ovari na matiti.

problem_behavior: Women do not respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding of their babies.

promoted_behavior.English: Women respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes respectent l'allaitement exclusif et régulier.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana heshimu unyonyeshaji wa kipekee na wa kawaida wa watoto wao.

message.English: Mother, Be careful!  If your baby is less than 6 months old, continue with exclusive breastfeeding and increase the frequency of breastfeeding during the illness and two weeks after the illness to keep the child healthy.
