message.French: Maman, Attention! En cas de maladie d’un bébé de moins de 6 mois, continuez avec la pratique d'allaitement exclusif en augmentant la fréquence de tété pendant la maladie et deux semaines après la maladie pour garder l'enfant en bonne santé.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, Kuwa mwangalifu!  Ikiwa ugonjwa wa mtoto chini ya miezi 6, endelea na mazoezi ya unyonyeshaji wa kipekee na kuongeza idadi ya nyakati za unyonyeshaji wakati wa ugonjwa na wiki mbili baada ya ugonjwa ili kuhakikisha afya njema kwa mtoto.

problem_behavior: Women do not respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding of their babies.

promoted_behavior.English: Women respect exclusive and regular breastfeeding.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes respectent l'allaitement exclusif et régulier.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana heshimu unyonyeshaji wa kipekee na wa kawaida wa watoto wao.

message.English: Working mother, to keep your baby healthy while you are away from home, continue with exclusive breastfeeding practice by pouring breast milk into clean and closed cups knowing that breast milk keeps for 8 to 10 hours in a cool place (room temperature).
message.French: Maman travailleuse, pour garder votre bébé en bonne santé pendant votre absence à la maison, continuez avec la pratique d'allaitement exclusif en exprimant le lait maternel dans des tasses bien propres et fermées sachant que le lait maternel se conserve pendant 8h à 10h dans un endroit frais (température ambiante).
message.Swahili: Mpendwa mama anayefanya kazi, kumweka mtoto wako afya wakati uko mbali na nyumbani, endelea na mazoezi ya unyonyeshaji wa kipekee kwa kuweka maziwa ya mama katika vikombe safi na vilivyofungwa kujua kwamba maziwa ya mama inaeza wekwa kwa masaa 8 hadi 10 mahali pa baridi (joto la chumba).

problem_behavior: Men (husband) do not encourage women to exclusively breastfeed their infants but rather induce them to give something else.

promoted_behavior.English: Men (Husbands) encourage and urge women to exclusively breastfeed their infants on a regular basis.
promoted_behavior.French: Les Hommes (Mari) encouragent et incitent les femmes à donner uniquement le lait maternel aux nourrissons de façon régulière.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanaume (waume) wana himiza wanawake kunyonyesha  kipekee watoto wachanga mara kwa mara.

message.English: Father, breast milk for children aged 0 to 6 months is a complete food that meets 100% of the baby's needs and contains enough water to satisfy his thirst; encourage your wives to exclusively breastfeed infants to protect them from diseases (diarrhea and respiratory infections, etc.)
message.French: Papa, le lait maternel chez l’enfant âgé de 0 à 6 mois est une nourriture complète répondant à 100% aux besoins du bébé et contenant la quantité suffisante d’eau pour étancher sa soif; encouragez vos   femmes à donner uniquement le lait maternel aux nourrissons pour les protéger contre les maladies (la diarrhée et les infections respiratoires, etc.)
message.Swahili: Baba Mpendwa, maziwa ya mama kwa watoto wenye umri wa miezi 0 hadi 6 ni chakula kamili ambacho ina kutana na 100% ya mahitaji ya mtoto na kina maji ya kutosha kuzima kiu yake; Mhimize mke wako kuwapa watoto wachanga maziwa ya mama ili kuwalinda na magonjwa (kuharisha na maambukizi ya kupumua, etc.)

problem_behavior: Men (husband) do not encourage women to exclusively breastfeed their infants but rather induce them to give something else.

promoted_behavior.English: Men (Husbands) encourage and urge women to exclusively breastfeed their infants on a regular basis.
promoted_behavior.French: Les Hommes (Mari) encouragent et incitent les femmes à donner uniquement le lait maternel aux nourrissons de façon régulière.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanaume (waume) wana himiza wanawake kunyonyesha  kipekee watoto wachanga mara kwa mara.

message.English: Father, encourage and urge your wives to exclusively breastfeed babies from 0 to 6 months to reduce the risk of obesity and diabetes in adulthood.
message.French: Papa, encouragez et incitez vos femmes à ne donner que le lait maternel aux bébés de 0 à 6 mois afin de réduire le risque d'obésité et de diabète à l'âge adulte.
message.Swahili: Baba Mpendwa, mhimize mke  wako kuwapa watoto maziwa ya mama kutoka miezi 0 hadi 6 ili kupunguza hatari ya obésité na ugonjwa wa kisukari watakapo komaa.

problem_behavior: Healthcare providers do not encourage women to exclusively breastfeed infants on a regular basis, and encourage them to engage in other practices

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers encourage and counsel women to exclusively breastfeed their infants on a regular basis
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires encouragent et incitent les femmes à allaiter les nourrissons de façon régulière et exclusive.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wa toa huduma wana himiza wanawake kunyonyesha watoto wachanga mara kwa mara na wa kipekee.

message.English: Healthcare providers, encouraging and urging women to breastfeed babies on a regular basis, 10 to 12 times a day and night and on demand by the baby is your responsibility for the healthy growth of the baby and the well-being of the mother.
message.French: Prestataires, encouragez et incitez les femmes à allaiter régulièrement les bébés 10 à 12 fois le jour, la nuit et sur demande du bébé est de votre responsabilité pour la bonne croissance du bébé et le bien-être de la maman.
message.Swahili: Prestataires, encouragez et incitez les femmes à allaiter régulièrement les bébés 10 à 12 fois le jour, la nuit et sur demande du bébé est de votre responsabilité pour la bonne croissance du bébé et le bien-être de la maman.

problem_behavior: They do not encourage women to use only breast milk to feed their babies

promoted_behavior.English: They encourage women to use only breast milk to feed their babies.
promoted_behavior.French: Les membres de la communauté incitent les femmes à allaiter les bébés uniquement avec le lait maternel.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanajamii wana himiza wanawake kunyonyesha watoto na maziwa ya mama pekee.

message.English: Community members, encourage breastfeeding women to exclusively breastfeed their babies with breast milk for the first 6 months and to wait until the babies are tired to ensure their healthy growth.
message.French: Membres de la communauté, incitez les femmes allaitantes à allaiter exclusivement leur bébé pendant les 6 premiers mois et à allaiter jusqu’à ce que le bébé soit fatigué pour garantir sa bonne croissance.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, wahimize wanawake wanao nyonyesha ku wa nyonyesha watoto wao maziwa ya mama pekee kwa miezi 6 ya kwanza na kuchukua muda hadi watoto wanapochoka ili kuhakikisha ku komaa vizuri.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

problem_behavior: Women do not breastfeed children up to 2 years and beyond.

promoted_behavior.English: Women breastfeed children up to 2 years and beyond.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes allaitent les enfants jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wananyonyesha watoto hadi miaka miwili na zaidi.

message.English: Mothers, breastfeed your children until they are 2 years old or older to promote their healthy growth
message.French: Mamans, allaitez vos enfants jusqu'à 2 ans et plus pour favoriser leur bonne croissance
message.Swahili: Wamama wapendwa, mu wa nyonyeshe watoto wenu hadi miaka 2 na zaidi ili kuhakikisha ku komaa kwao vizuri.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

problem_behavior: Men do not encourage their wives to breastfeed children up to 2 years and beyond

promoted_behavior.English: Men encourage their wives to breastfeed children up to 2 years and beyond.
promoted_behavior.French: Les hommes encouragent les femmes à allaiter les enfants jusqu'à de 2 ans et plus.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanaume wahimiza wanawake kunyonyesha watoto hadi umri wa miaka 2 na zaidi.

message.English: Fathers, encourage your wives to breastfeed children until they are 2 years and older for their healthy growth.
message.French: Papas, encouragez vos femmes à allaiter les enfants jusqu'à 2 ans et plus pour leur bonne croissance.
message.Swahili: Wababa wapendwa, wahimize wake zenu ku wanyonyesha watoto hadi miaka 2 na zaidi ili wa komae vizuri.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

problem_behavior: Healthcare providers do not encourage women to breastfeed children until they are 2 years old or older.

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers encourage women to breastfeed children until they are 2 years old or older.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires encouragent les femmes à allaiter les enfants jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wana himiza wanawake kuwanyonyesha watoto hadi umri wa miaka 2 na zaidi.

message.English: Healthcare providers, encourage women to breastfeed their babies until they are 2 years old and older for healthy growth.
message.French: Prestataires, encouragez les femmes à allaiter leurs bébés jusqu'à l'âge de 2 ans et plus une bonne croissance.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, mu wahimize wanawake ku nyonyesha watoto wao hadi umri wa miaka 2 na zaidi ili wa komae vizuri.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

problem_behavior: Community members discourage women from continuous breastfeeding practices for 2-year-olds.

promoted_behavior.English: Community members encourage women in continuous breastfeeding practices for 2-year-olds.
promoted_behavior.French: Les membres de la communauté encouragent les femmes dans les pratiques d’allaitement continu des enfants de 2 ans.
promoted_behavior.English: Wanajamii wana himiza wanawake kuendelea kunyonyesha watoto hadi umri wa miaka 2 na zaidi.

message.English: Community members, encourage women to breastfeed their children until they are 2 years and older to prevent illness and ensure their healthy growth.
message.French: Membres de la communauté, encouragez les femmes à allaiter les enfants jusqu'à 2 ans et plus pour prévenir les maladies et assurer leur bonne croissance.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, mu wahimize wanawake ku wa nyonyesha watoto hadi miaka 2 na zaidi ili kuzuia magonjwa na kuhakikisha kwa sahihi ku komaa kwao vizuri.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

problem_behavior: Breastfeeding women do not respect the number and variety of meals for children from 6 months of age.

promoted_behavior.English: Breastfeeding women respect the number and variety of meals for children from 6 months of age.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes allaitantes respectent le nombre et la variété des repas des enfants à partir de 6 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wanaonyonyesha wana heshimu idadi na aina ya chakula ya watoto kutoka miezi 6.

message.English: Mother, a healthy child is the pride of his family, give the baby from 6 months a varied diet such as: meat, fish, egg, milk, papaya, mango, pineapple, cauliflower, spinach, soybeans, bean, peanut, etc. ;3 times a day and two snacks for the healthy growth of the child.
message.French: Maman, un enfant en bonne santé fait la fierté de sa famille, donnez au bébé à partir de 6 mois l'alimentation variée tels que: viande, poisson, œuf, lait, papaye, mangue, ananas, chou-fleur, épinard, soja, haricot, arachide, etc.; 3 fois par jour et deux collations pour la bonne croissance de l'enfant.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, mtoto mwenye afya ni furaha ya familia yake, mpe mtoto kutoka miezi 6 chakula tofauti kama vile : nyama, samaki, mayai, maziwa, papaya, embe, ananas, chou-fleur, épinards, soya, maharage, karanga, etc; Mara 3 kwa siku na vitafunio viwili kwa ku sahihisha ku komaa vizuri kwa mtoto.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

problem_behavior: Breastfeeding women do not respect the number and variety of meals for children from 6 months of age.

promoted_behavior.English: Breastfeeding women respect the number and variety of meals for children from 6 months of age.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes allaitantes respectent le nombre et la variété des repas des enfants à partir de 6 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wanaonyonyesha wana heshimu idadi na aina ya chakula ya watoto kutoka miezi 6.

message.English: Mother, if your baby is sick from 6 months of age, continue to breastfeed and increase the number of meals until two weeks after the illness to keep him healthy.
message.French: Mamans, en cas de maladie du bébé à partir de 6 mois, continuez à l’allaiter, à l’alimenter et à augmenter le nombre de ses repas jusqu'à deux semaines après la maladie pour le garder en bonne santé.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, ikiwa ni ugonjwa wa mtoto kutoka miezi 6, endelea kumnyonyesha kumlisha na kuongeza idadi ya chakula chake hadi wiki mbili baada ya ugonjwa kumweka afya.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

target_audience.French: Homme (mari) et membres de la communauté

problem_behavior: Men and community members do not encourage or support women to respect the number and variety of meals for children from 6 months of age.

promoted_behavior.English: Men encourage and support their wives to respect the number and variety of children's meals from 6 months of age.
promoted_behavior.French: Les hommes encouragent et soutiennent leurs femmes au respect du nombre et variété du repas des enfants à partir de 6 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanaume wanahimiza na kusaidia wake zao kuheshimu idadi na aina ya chakula cha watoto kutoka miezi 6.

message.English: Father and community members, the health of your baby is very important, encourage and support your wives to give the baby from 6 months a variety of foods such as: meat, fish, egg, milk, papaya, mango, pineapple, cauliflower, spinach, soybeans, bean, peanut, etc,; 3 times a day and two snacks for his healthy growth.
message.French: Papa et membres de la communauté, la santé de votre bébé   est primordiale, encouragez et soutenez vos femmes à donner au bébé à partir de 6 mois les aliments variés tels que: viande, poisson, œuf, lait, papaye, mangue, ananas, chou- fleur, épinard, soja, haricot, arachide, etc.; 3 fois par jour et deux collations pour sa bonne croissance.
message.Swahili: Baba Mpendwa na wanajamii, afya ya mtoto wako ni muhimu, himiza na kumsaidia mwanamke kumpa mtoto kutoka miezi 6 chakula mbalimbali kama vile: nyama, samaki, mayai, maziwa, papaya, embe, ananas, chou-fleur, épinard, soya, maharage, karanga, etc; mara 3 kwa siku na vitafunio viwili ili a komae vizuri.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Healthcare providers do not adequately inform breastfeeding mothers about appropriate complementary feeding practices for babies from 6 months of age.

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers adequately inform breastfeeding mothers about appropriate complementary feeding practices for babies from 6 months of age.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires informent suffisamment les femmes allaitantes sur la pratique d'alimentation de compléments adéquats pour le bébé à partir de 6 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wanatoa taarifa za kutosha kwa wanawake wanaonyonyesha juu ya mazoezi ya ulishaji wa kutosha kwa watoto kutoka miezi 6.

message.English: Healthcare providers, provide adequate information to women with babies from 6 months onwards on the variety of protein foods of animal origin (meat, fish, egg and milk); of vegetable origin (fruits and vegetables: papaya, mango, pineapple, cauliflower, spinach, etc.); legumes (soybeans, beans, peanuts, etc.) 3 times a day and two snacks for the healthy growth of their babies.
message.French: Prestataires, donnez les informations suffisantes aux femmes ayant des bébés à partir de 6 mois sur la variété des aliments en protéine d'origine animale (viande, poisson, œuf et lait); d'origine végétale (fruits et légumes: papaye, mangue, ananas, chou- fleur, épinard, etc.); le légumineuse (soja, haricot, arachide, etc.) 3 fois par jour et deux collations pour la bonne croissance de leurs bébés.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, wape taarifa za kutosha kwa wanawake wenye watoto kutoka miezi 6 juu ya aina mbalimbali za vyakula yenye protini kutoka kwa wanyama (nyama, samaki, mayai na maziwa); mboga (matunda na mboga: papaya, embe, ananas, chou-fleur, épinard, etc.); (soya, maharage, karanga, etc.) mara 3 kwa siku na vitafunio viwili ili wa komae vizuri.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not consume sufficient and varied foods.

promoted_behavior.English: Pregnant women consume sufficient and varied foods.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes enceintes consomment des aliments variés et suffisants.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wajawazito wana tumia vyakula mbalimbali na vya kutosha.

message.English: Pregnant women, eat a variety of foods such as meat, fish, beans, soybeans, peanuts, cowpeas, pineapples, bananas, mangoes, etc. and eat two extra meals to maintain your health and the health of your unborn child.
message.French: Femmes enceintes, consommez des aliments variés tels que la viande, le poisson, le haricot, le soja, l’arachide, niébé, ananas, bananes, mangue, etc. et prenez deux repas supplémentaires pour garantir votre santé et celle du futur bébé.
message.Swahili: Wapendwa wanawake wajawazito, unahitaji kula vyakula mbalimbali kama vile nyama, samaki, maharagwe, soya, karanga, ananas, banana, embe, etc. kula mara mbili zaidi ili kuhakikisha afya yako na ya mtoto wako.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Some breastfeeding women do not consume a sufficient variety of foods.

promoted_behavior.English: All women consume a sufficient variety of foods.
promoted_behavior.French: Toutes les femmes consomment des aliments variés suffisants.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wote wana tumia vyakula mbalimbali vya kutosha.

message.English: Breastfeeding woman, eat a variety of foods of animal origin (meat, eggs, fish) and vegetable origin (beans, soybeans, peanuts, cowpeas, pineapples, bananas, mangos, etc.) and eat two extra meals to maintain your health and that of your baby.
message.French: Femme allaitante, consommez des aliments variés et suffisants d’origine animale (viande, œufs poisson), d’origine végétale (haricot, soja, arachide, niébé, ananas, bananes, mangue, etc.) et prenez deux repas supplémentaires pour garantir votre santé et celle du bébé.
message.Swahili: Wapendwa wanawake wanaonyonyesha, unahitaji kula vyakula mbalimbali kama vile nyama, samaki, maharagwe, soya, karanga, ananas, banana, embe, etc. kula mara mbili zaidi ili kuhakikisha afya yako na ya mtoto wako.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

target_audience.French: Homme (mari) et membres de la communauté

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Husbands do not support their wives to consume sufficient variety of foods.

promoted_behavior.English: Husbands support their wives to consume sufficient variety of foods.
promoted_behavior.French: Les maris soutiennent leurs femmes à consommer des aliments variés suffisants.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Waume wanaunga mkono wake zao kula vyakula mbalimbali vya kutosha.

message.English: Husband and community members, support pregnant and lactating women to consume a variety of sufficient animal and vegetable foods such as meat, fish, beans, soybeans, peanuts, cowpeas, pineapples, bananas, mangoes, etc. and eat two extra meals to ensure their health and that of the baby.
message.French: Maris et les membres de la communauté, soutenez les femmes enceintes ou allaitantes à consommer des aliments variés suffisants d’origine animale et végétale comme la viande, le poisson, le haricot, le soja, l’arachide, le niébé, l’ananas, les bananes, la mangue, etc. et de prendre deux repas supplémentaires pour garantir leur santé et celle des bébés.
message.Swahili: Mume mpendwa na wanajamii, muunge mkono wanawake wajawazito au wanaonyonyesha kula vyakula mbalimbali vya kutosha kutoka kwa wanyama na mboga kama vile nyama, samaki, maharagwe, soya, karanga, ananas, banana, embe, etc. na kula mara mbili zaidi ili kuhakikisha afya yake na ya mtoto wako.

intervention.English: Breastfeeding continues until the child is 2 years old or older.
intervention.French: L’allaitement continue jusqu'à 2 ans et plus.
intervention.Swahili: Unyonyeshaji unaendelea hadi miaka 2 na zaidi.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Healthcare providers do not adequately inform women about eating a variety of foods.

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers adequately inform women about eating a variety of foods.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires, informent suffisamment les femmes sur la consommation des aliments suffisamment variés.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wanatoa taarifa za kutosha kwa wanawake juu ya matumizi ya vyakula mbalimbali vya kutosha.

message.English: Healthcare providers, make sure to inform and discuss with pregnant and breastfeeding women about the consumption of various foods of animal origin (meat, fish), vegetable origin (fruits: bananas, pineapples, mangoes, etc.), (vegetables) spinach, cauliflower and legumes (soybeans, beans, peanuts) and the inclusion of an extra meal for the pregnant woman and two for the breastfeeding woman in order to maintain their health and that of their babies during the pregnancy and breastfeeding period.
message.French: Prestataires, informez et discutez suffisamment avec les femmes enceintes et allaitantes sur la consommation des aliments variés d'origine animale (viande, poisson) végétale (les fruits: bananes, ananas, mangues, etc.), (légumes) les épinards, chou-fleur et les légumineuses (soja, haricot, arachide) et l'ajout supplémentaire d'un repas pour la femme enceinte et de deux pour la femme allaitante pour garantir leur santé et celle de leur bébés pendant la grossesse et l'allaitement.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, wajulishe na ongeya vya kutosha na wanawake wajawazito na wanaonyonyesha kuhusu matumizi ya vyakula mbalimbali kutoka kwa wanyama (nyama, samaki), matunda (banana, ananas, maembe, etc.), mboga (épinards, chou-fleur; soya, maharagwe, karanga) na kuongeza ziada ya chakula moja kwa mwanamke mjamzito na mbili kwa mwanamke anayenyonyesha ili kuhakikisha afya zao na watoto wao wakati wa ujauzito na unyonyeshaji.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Breastfeeding women do not comply with the vaccination schedule for infants aged 0 to 9 months.

promoted_behavior.English: Women comply with the infant vaccination schedule.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes respectent le calendrier de vaccination des nourrissons.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana heshimu ratiba ya chanjo ya watoto wachanga.

message.English: Breastfeeding woman, we should comply with the 5 free vaccination appointments to ensure the good health of our children from 0 to 9 months.
message.French: Femmes allaitantes, respectons les 5 rendez-vous de vaccination gratuite pour garantir la bonne santé de nos enfants de 0 à 9 mois.
message.Swahili: Mwanamke mpendwa anayenyonyesha, hebu tuheshimu ziara 5 za chanjo za bure ili kuhakikisha afya nzuri ya watoto wetu kutoka miezi 0 hadi 9.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Breastfeeding women do not comply with the vaccination schedule for infants aged 0 to 9 months.

promoted_behavior.English: Women comply with the infant vaccination schedule.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes respectent le calendrier vaccination des nourrissons.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wana heshimu ratiba ya chanjo ya watoto wachanga.

message.English: Mom, have your child vaccinated 5 times before his first birthday to protect him from vaccine-preventable diseases.
message.French: Maman, faites vacciner 5 fois votre enfant avant son premier anniversaire pour le protéger des maladies évitables par la vaccination.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, peleka   mtoto wako apate chanjo mara 5 kabla ya siku kuu yake ya kwanza ya kuzaliwa (1er anniversaire) kuwalinda na magonjwa yanayozuilika na chanjo.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Husbands do not encourage their wives to comply with the vaccination schedule for infants aged 0 to 9 months.

promoted_behavior.English: Husbands assist and encourage their wives to comply with the vaccination schedule for infants aged 0 to 9 months.
promoted_behavior.French: Les maris accompagnent et incitent leurs femmes au respect du calendrier vaccinal des nourrissons âgé de 0 à 9 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Waume wana saidia na wana himiza wake zao kuheshimu ratiba ya chanjo kwa watoto wachanga wenye umri wa miezi 0 hadi 9.

message.English: Husband, healthy children make parents happy, encourage and urge your wives to comply with the routine monthly vaccination schedule for infants aged 0 to 9 months to ensure their health.
message.French: Mari, un enfant en bonne santé fait le bonheur des parents, encouragez et incitez vos femmes à respecter chaque mois le calendrier de vaccination de routine des nourrissons âgés de 0 à 9 mois pour garantir leur santé.
message.Swahili: Mume mpendwa, mtoto mwenye afya ni furaha ya wazazi, uunge mkono na kumhimiza mke wako kuheshimu ratiba ya kawaida ya chanjo ya watoto wachanga wenye umri wa miezi 0 hadi 9 kila mwezi ili kuhakikisha afya zao.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Healthcare providers do not adequately inform breastfeeding women about the importance and value of routine vaccination of infants aged 0-9 months.

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers adequately inform breastfeeding women about the importance and value of routine vaccination of infants aged 0-9 months.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires informent suffisamment les femmes allaitantes sur l'importance et le bien-fondé de la vaccination de routine des nourrissons âgés de 0 à 9 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma wana wapa taarifa za kutosha kwa wanawake wanaonyonyesha kuhusu umuhimu na usahihi wa chanjo ya kawaida ya watoto wachanga wenye umri wa miezi 0 hadi 9.

message.English: Healthcare providers, inform parents about the importance and necessity of routine immunization of their children aged 0 to 9 months at birth, 1.5 months, 2.5 months, 3.5 months and 9 months to protect them against tuberculosis, polio, diphtheria, whooping cough, hepatitis B, meningitis, pneumonia, yellow fever and measles to safeguard their health.
message.French: Prestataires, informez les parents sur l’importance et la nécessité de la vaccination de routine de leurs enfants âgés de 0 à 9 mois : à la naissance, à 1 mois et demi, à 2 mois et demi ; à 3 mois et demi et à 9 mois pour les protéger contre la tuberculose, la polio, la diphtérie, la coqueluche, l'hépatite B, la méningite, la pneumonie, la fièvre jaune et la rougeole. Pour garantir la santé des nourrissons.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, wajulishe wazazi kuhusu umuhimu wa chanjo ya mara kwa mara ya watoto wao wenye umri wa miezi 0 hadi 9 wakati wa kuzaliwa, mwezi 1 na nusu, miezi 2 na nusu; katika miezi 3 na nusu na miezi 9 ili kuwalinda na magonjwa ya  tuberculose, polio, diphtérie, coqueluche, hépatite B, méningite, pneumonie, homa ya manjano na rougeole ili kuhakikisha afya ya watoto wachanga.

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Community members do not encourage breastfeeding women to attend routine monthly vaccination of infants aged 0-9 months.

promoted_behavior.English: Community members encourage breastfeeding women to attend routine monthly vaccination of infants aged 0-9 months.
promoted_behavior.French: Les membres de la communauté, encouragent les femmes allaitantes à se rendre chaque mois aux séances de la vaccination de routine de nourrissons âgés de 0 à 9 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanajamii wana himiza wanawake wanaonyonyesha kuenda kamata chanjo ya watoto wachanga mara kwa mara wenye umri wa miezi 0 hadi 9 kila mwezi.

message.English: Community members, encourage women to attend routine monthly vaccination for infants aged 0-9 months to ensure their healthy growth.
message.French: Membres de la communauté, encouragez les femmes à amener les nourrissons âgés de 0 à 9 mois à la vaccination de routine chaque mois pour leur garantir une bonne croissance.
message.Swahili: Wanajamii wapendwa, wahimize wanawake kuleta watoto wachanga wenye umri wa miezi 0 hadi 9 kupata chanjo ya kawaida kila mwezi ili wa komae vizuri.

intervention.English: Other preschool consultation (PSC) activities (growth monitoring, infant and young child feeding advice, etc.)
intervention.French: Les autres activités de la Consultation Préscolaire (CPS) (le suivi de croissance, les conseils en alimentation du nourrisson et du jeune enfant (ANJE), etc.)
intervention.Swahili: Shughuli zingine za Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (ufuatiliaji wa ukuaji, ushauri wa ANJE...)

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Breastfeeding women do not comply with CPS appointments for children 0-59 months of age.

promoted_behavior.English: Breastfeeding women comply with preschool consultation (PSC) appointments for children 0-59 months of age.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes allaitantes respectent les rendez-vous de la consultation préscolaire (CPS) des enfants de 0 à 59 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake wanaonyonyesha wana heshimu ziara za CPS kwa watoto wa miezi 0 hadi 59.

message.English: Mother, take your child to the preschool consultation until the age of 59 months for the proper monitoring of his growth.
message.French: Maman, emmenez votre enfant à la consultation préscolaire jusqu'à l'âge de 59 mois pour le bon suivi de sa croissance.
message.Swahili: Mama mpendwa, mpeleke mtoto wako kwenye mashauriano kabla ya shule hadi umri wa miezi 59 kwa ufuatiliaji sahihi wa ukuaji wake.

intervention.English: Other preschool consultation (PSC) activities (growth monitoring, infant and young child feeding advice, etc.)
intervention.French: Les autres activités de la Consultation Préscolaire (CPS) (le suivi de croissance, les conseils en alimentation du nourrisson et du jeune enfant (ANJE), etc.)
intervention.Swahili: Shughuli zingine za Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (ufuatiliaji wa ukuaji, ushauri wa ANJE...)

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Men do not provide support to women in preschool consultation.

promoted_behavior.English: Men provide their support to women in preschool consultation.
promoted_behavior.French: Les hommes soutiennent les femmes à la consultation préscolaire.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanaume wana waunga mkono wanawake katika mashauriano kabla ya shule.

message.English: Husband/partner, be supportive of your wife/partner's compliance with preschool consultation (PSC) appointments for the well-being of your child from 0-59 months.
message.French: Mari/partenaire, soutenez votre femme/partenaire au respect des rendez-vous préscolaires pour le bien être de votre enfant de 0 à 59 mois.
message.Swahili: Mpendwa mume/mpenzi, msaidie mke/mpenzi wako katika kuheshimu mikutano ya CPS kwa ajili ya ustawi wa mtoto wako kutoka miezi 0 hadi 59.

intervention.English: Other preschool consultation (PSC) activities (growth monitoring, infant and young child feeding advice, etc.)
intervention.French: Les autres activités de la Consultation Préscolaire (CPS) (le suivi de croissance, les conseils en alimentation du nourrisson et du jeune enfant (ANJE), etc.)
intervention.Swahili: Shughuli zingine za Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (ufuatiliaji wa ukuaji, ushauri wa ANJE...)

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Some healthcare providers do not advise women to comply with preschool appointments up to 59 months of age.

promoted_behavior.English: Healthcare providers advise women to comply with preschool appointments up to 59 months of age.
promoted_behavior.French: Les prestataires conseillent les femmes sur le respect des rendez-vous de la consultation préscolaire jusqu'à 59 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Watoa huduma  wanashauri wanawake juu ya heshima ya mikutano ya mashauriano kabla ya shule kutoka 0 hadi miezi 59.

message.English: Healthcare providers, advise women on compliance with preschool appointments for the well-being of their children 0-59 months.
message.French: Prestataires, conseillez les femmes sur le respect des rendez-vous préscolaires pour le bien-être de leurs enfants de 0 à 59 mois.
message.Swahili: Watoa huduma wapendwa, washauri wanawake juu ya heshima ya mashauriano kabla ya shule kwa ustawi wa watoto wao kutoka miezi 0 hadi 59.

intervention.English: Other preschool consultation (PSC) activities (growth monitoring, infant and young child feeding advice, etc.)
intervention.French: Les autres activités de la Consultation Préscolaire (CPS) (le suivi de croissance, les conseils en alimentation du nourrisson et du jeune enfant (ANJE), etc.)
intervention.Swahili: Shughuli zingine za Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (ufuatiliaji wa ukuaji, ushauri wa ANJE...)

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Community members do not encourage women to comply with preschool appointments up to 59 months.

promoted_behavior.English: Community members encourage women to comply with preschool appointments up to 59 months.
promoted_behavior.French: Les membres de la communauté incitent les femmes au respect des rendez-vous de la consultation préscolaire jusqu'à 59 mois.
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanajamii wana himiza wanawake kuheshimu mashauriano kabla ya shule kutoka 0 hadi miezi 59.

message.English: Community members, for healthy child development and growth, encourage women to comply with preschool appointments up to 59 months.
message.French: Membres de la communauté, pour garantir le développement et la croissance des enfants, encouragez les femmes au respect des rendez-vous de la consultation préscolaire jusqu'à 59 mois
message.Swahili: Kuhakikisha maendeleo na ukuaji wa watoto, inaomba kuwahimiza wanawake kuheshimu mashauriano kabla ya shule hadi miezi 59.

intervention.English: Other preschool consultation (PSC) activities (growth monitoring, infant and young child feeding advice, etc.)
intervention.French: Les autres activités de la Consultation Préscolaire (CPS) (le suivi de croissance, les conseils en alimentation du nourrisson et du jeune enfant (ANJE), etc.)
intervention.Swahili: Shughuli zingine za Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (ufuatiliaji wa ukuaji, ushauri wa ANJE...)

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Mothers do not respect the CPoN3 service (42 days after delivery) and only wait for complications to arise in order to go to the health center.

promoted_behavior.English: Mothers respect the post natal consultation (PoNC) service.
promoted_behavior.French: Les femmes accouchées respectent le service de consultation post natale (CPoN).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanawake ambao wamezaa wana heshimu huduma ya Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (CPoN).

message.English: Postpartum woman, continue to go to postnatal consultation to receive vitamin A within 40 days after delivery to ensure your good health and that of the baby.
message.French: Accouchée, chère femme après l’accouchement, continuez d'aller à la consultation postnatale pour recevoir la vitamine A dans les 40 jours qui suivent l’accouchement afin de garantir votre bonne santé et celle du bébé.
message.Swahili: Mwanamke mpendwa aliyezaa, endelea kwenda kwenye mashauriano ya Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa baada ya kuzaa ili kupokea vitamini A ndani ya siku 40 za kuzaa ili kuhakikisha afya yako nzuri na ya mtoto.

intervention.English: Other preschool consultation (PSC) activities (growth monitoring, infant and young child feeding advice, etc.)
intervention.French: Les autres activités de la Consultation Préscolaire (CPS) (le suivi de croissance, les conseils en  alimentation du nourrisson et du jeune enfant (ANJE), etc.)
intervention.Swahili: Shughuli zingine za Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (ufuatiliaji wa ukuaji, ushauri wa ANJE...)

promoted_behavior.problem_behavior: Men do not encourage their wives to go to the health center for post natal consultation (PoNC) service

promoted_behavior.English: Men encourage their wives to go to the health center for post natal consultation (PoNC) service
promoted_behavior.French: Les hommes encouragent leurs femmes à se rendre au centre de santé pour le service de la consultation post natale (CPoN).
promoted_behavior.Swahili: Wanaume wana himiza wake zao kwenda kwenye kituo cha afya kwa huduma ya Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa (CPoN).

message.English: Husband, encourage your wife to go to the health center in the post natal consultation (PoNC) department for her nutritional and gynecological status assessment.
message.French: Homme, encourage ta femme à se rendre au service de la consultation postnatale au centre de santé pour l’évaluation de son état nutritionnel et de son   statut gynécologique.
message.Swahili: Mpendwa mume, mhimize mke wako kwenda kwenye huduma ya Mashauriano baada ya kuzaa katika kituo cha afya kufuatilia hali yake ya lishe na hali yake ya gynecologie.
